participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and community-oriented, enjoys connecting with others and values family.
participant_1.background: I once got to see System of a Down live in concert, and it was one of the best experiences of my life. I collect stamps. I went to the beach and wore my favorite pair of sweatpants. I volunteer in my spare time. The kids will be my responsibility as my husband does not want them.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Determined and reflective, possesses a strong work ethic and cherishes family traditions.
participant_2.background: I am proud of my ability to stay focused and motivated on my writing, even when it's difficult. Someday I would like a truck. My mom would have been proud of me for talking my way out of the ticket. My mom raised me by herself and taught me to play baseball. I spent my last birthday with my family at our farm, eating a delicious home-cooked meal and playing games.

content.text: Happy Tuesday! Hope you had a great weekend.
Thanks! You too! I went to my family's farm for my birthday and had a great time.
That sounds awesome! What kind of games did you play?
We played corn hole, horseshoes, and cards.
Sounds like a lot of fun! I hope you had some good home cooked food too!
Yes, my mom made a delicious pot roast.
My mom made pot roast for dinner last night too!
That's awesome! I'm glad we both had a good time on our birthdays.
Me too! What are you up to today?
I'm going to work on a writing project and then go for a walk.
Sounds like a good plan. I'm going to go to the gym and then go to work.
